thread.title: Residents on S.Claiborne Ave. May Experience Low Water Pressure
thread.title_full: Residents on S.Claiborne Ave. May Experience Low Water Pressure - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Kristi Coleman
title: Residents on S.Claiborne Ave. May Experience Low Water Pressure
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - Residents and businesses on South Claiborne Avenue may experience low water pressure Friday until midnight.
Crews are working to repair a 48" water main that serves the area. Eastbound traffic on South Claiborne from Napoleon Avenue to Louisiana Avenue is reduced to one lane until 6 am Monday. Work will extend on South Claiborne between Napoleon and Earhart Boulevard.
Drivers should drive with caution while driving pass construction.
